title: Facebook and Google grew into tech titans by ignoring Wall Street. Now it could lead to their downfall
text: Alphabet Inc. and Meta Platforms Inc. became two of the most valuable companies in the world by largely ignoring Wall Street and its concerns about their spending and big-money acquisitions.

title: Alphabet vs. Meta Platforms: Which Stock Has Higher Quality?
text: As investors parse through earnings for major big tech companies, GuruFocus users can compare financial strength, profitability, valuation, growth and momentum indicators for multiple companies using the Stock Comparison Table, a Premium feature.

title: Tech ETFs Sink on Microsoft, Google Earnings
text: Shares of QQQ dropped nearly 2% during intraday trading.

title: 7 Undervalued Blue-Chip Stocks to Buy Now
text: Undervalued blue-chip stocks are a little easier to find in the midst of the current bear market. There are bargains to be found for investors who can stomach short-term volatility.

title: Google cites crypto winter as a factor in its Q2 revenue decline
text: (Kitco News) - Google points to the pullback in crypto as a contributing factor in its Q2 advertising revenue decline while its long-running case with the DOJ finally reaches a settlement.

title: The Domino Effect: Apple, and the Market, Could Be Dragged Down by Alphabet's Big Miss
text: Apple will report fiscal fourth-quarter earnings on Thursday after markets close, and investors fear that it's being dragged down by the same forces hitting other tech giants.

title: Support for gold should hold at $1,600 - Standard Charter's Suki Copper
text: (Kitco News) - Renewed buying momentum in the gold market has pushed gold prices to a nearly two-week high as both the U.S. dollar and bond yields fall, as markets continue to shift their expectations regarding the Federal Reserve's aggressive monetary policy stance.

title: Alphabet Slips on Q3 Earnings Miss: ETFs in Focus
text: Google parent Alphabet reported weak third-quarter 2022 results, missing both revenue and earnings estimates. Slowing ad sales growth is responsible for the weak results.

title: Alphabet Stock Eyes Worst Day Since 2020 After Earnings
text: Alphabet Inc   (NASDAQ:GOOGL) is down 6.4% at $97.84 this morning, after the tech behemoth's third-quarter earnings and revenue fell short of expectations.

title: Alphabet's Ad Business Slows to a Trickle. Time to Sell?
text: The recession is coming for the search giant.

title: Alphabet, Microsoft, and Texas Instruments Sink After Earnings. Alarms Are Ringing for Big Tech.
text: Alphabet flags an advertising pullback while Microsoft's cloud-computing growth disappoints.

title: Alphabet falls after disappointing earnings that analysts say could signal bad news for Meta
text: Shares of Alphabet dipped Wednesday, a day after the company released third-quarter earnings that missed on top and bottom lines.

title: Alphabet is ‘a big ship to turn around,' when it comes to much-needed belt-tightening, but Wall Street has faith
text: Alphabet Inc. shares were hinting at their worst session since the early days of the pandemic on Wednesday after the company logged disappointing results, but Wall Street analysts seemed ready to give the tech behemoth the benefit of the doubt over its much-needed cost cuts.

title: Alphabet's big earnings miss points to flagging demand for digital advertising — and problems for the broader economy
text: Google's parent company partly blamed its underperformance on a tough economic backdrop and advertisers pulling back on spending.

title: Is Google's Cash All But Trash?
text: Google missed third-quarter earnings estimates on Oct. 25. The shares reacted promptly and the stock has fallen below $100 again - which makes value investors sit up and take notice. In this article, I will dissect Google's cash flow statement, taking into account working capital movements, acquisitions, and most importantly, stock-based compensation and share buybacks.

title: Is Google's Business Model Under Threat?
text: Diversification has always been the name of the game in investing, and that's particularly true in the tech sector.

title: Big Tech tumbles as results sound alarm bells
text: Grim results from Alphabet Inc and Microsoft Corp stoked fears of a global economic downturn and slammed the brakes on a fragile recovery in stock markets ahead of earnings from other tech megacaps.

title: Nasdaq falls after Alphabet's earnings miss ignites worries about Big Tech's digital ad sales
text: Disappointing after-hours Big Tech earnings sparked a sell-off in the index Wednesday.
